interpretation: The "middle finger" emoji represents defiance and rebellion. It is a symbol of resistance against authority and societal norms. This card can also signify a lack of respect or a refusal to conform. It may suggest that the querent is feeling frustrated or angry and needs to express themselves in a more assertive manner. However, it is important to be mindful of the potential consequences of such behavior. This card can also serve as a reminder to stand up for oneself and not be afraid to speak truth to power. Associated keywords include defiance, rebellion, nonconformity, disrespect, assertiveness, and anger.
